mapper.insert: insert into gallery(author_id, title, content, newPicture, oldPicture, temp, views, upload_date, thumbs_up, thumbs_down) values(#{author_id}, #{title}, #{content},#{newPicture},#{newPicture},#{newPicture}, 0, NOW(), 0, 0)
mapper.select: select gallery_code, author_id, title, content, views, newPicture, oldPicture, upload_date, emp.name_kor from gallery gal, employees emp where gallery_code = #{gallery_code} and gal.author_id=emp.id Order by gal.gallery_code desc limit 1
